graph_title: Percentage of children under the age of 5 who are: (a) two standard deviations behind (moderate and severe stunting and obesity), (b) three standard deviations behind (severe developmental delay and obesity) in relation to the mean value of body weight in relation to height, according to the WHO standard
indicator_name: Percentage of children under the age of 5 who are: (a) two standard deviations behind (moderate and severe stunting and obesity), (b) three standard deviations behind (severe developmental delay and obesity) in relation to the mean value of body weight in relation to height, according to the WHO standard
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Percentage of children under the age of 5 who are: (a) two standard deviations behind (moderate and severe stunting and obesity), (b) three standard deviations behind (severe developmental delay and obesity) in relation to the mean value of body weight in relation to height, according to the WHO standard
